summary:
I am a UX/UI designer with over 9 years of experience in conceptualizing and crafting digital products, helping businesses and non-profits expand their capacity for impact. I have a background in brand strategy and marketing and gained expertise in discovering the most uncovered human insight and using it strategically to design behavior-changing products, services, and campaigns. 

As a side business, I help aspiring design students build a career they love by mentoring on online platforms such as ADPlist. I also enjoy designing learning experiences and sharing my knowledge and passion for design and technology by developing curriculums for bootcamps.

Please reach out via Linkedin DM if you want to explore what we can do together.

projects.title: NetEdu Project
projects.description: The NetEduProject is an international interconnected community of leaders, educators, and researchers that is growing, aiming to cultivate and weave local learning ecosystems to effectively respond to our society and planet's challenges. I lead the development and execution of the SchoolWeavers digital tool and enlargement of the NetEdu community in Turkey.

projects.title: Good Practices in Education Conferences
projects.description:
The Conference, organized by Education Reform Initiative and supported by Sabancı Foundation and Sabancı University, is continuously held since 2003. It aims to generate new platforms that will enable educators to get together to share their creations and good practices. In addition to presentations of good practices, the conference program is enriched with workshops, banner presentations, which set the stage for face-to-face dialogue among participants across various educational topics. The conferences allow participants such as the representatives of the Ministry of Education, teachers, academics, representatives from civil society organizations, parents, representatives from the private sector with a stake in education, and students to collaborate and communicate across different fields of study and different levels.

Every year the Conference is curated around a theme and communicated as a social awareness campaign under the same theme. The campaigns are widely accoladed for their success in raising societal engagement at the most prestigious advertising award ceremonies in Turkey.

projects.title: Transformation of Emerging Countries from Destination to Source of Foreign Direct Investment (FDI). Example of Turkey.
projects.description: Master's thesis written in the framework of the course 'Transnational Corporations and the European Economic Space' under supervision of Prof. Paolo Guerrieri.

projects.title: Unsafe Toys of Europe: Mattel Recalls
projects.description: Business case written in the framework of 'Seminar on Business Cases' at College of Europe under supervision of Prof. Jacques Pelkmans, Prof. Aimé Heene and Assist. Joanna Dreger. My goal was to make reader think and discuss on the effects of Mattel recall crisis on EU regulations and on international supply chain management.

projects.title: Turkish National Week at College of Europe
projects.description: As the leader of the organizing team, the event was curated for College of Europe students, professors, and staff. For the full week event, the organizing team raised a 20.000€ budget with almost 20 different sponsors among which there are Turkish Airlines, the Ministry for EU Affairs, TÜSİAD, BELKAD, and Efes Pilsener. After the event was successfully held, the remaining budget was donated to "Baba Beni Okula Gönder" campaign by the organizing team for covering the education expenses of two girl students.

projects.title: Analysis of Consumer Responses to Toyota Recalls on Online Media
projects.description: A qualitative research on Toyota recall crisis and Toyota's image repair strategies conducted by Prof. Nazlı Wasti-Pamuksuz. I worked on sentiment analysis of consumer responses to Toyota recalls on online media.

profile_positions.description:
- Redesigning the user experience of MobilDeniz, the mobile app of DenizBank, with more than 10 million+ users. 
- Designing user flows and wireframes for the bank's new services and redesigning the user experience of existing services in line with the business goals. 
- Preparing test scenarios for usability tests, and incorporating research findings in the designing process. 
- Conducting sprint planning for new projects.
- Supporting the foundation of the Design Research and Strategy department, coordinating user research activities, preparing usability heuristic reviews, and developing strategic concepts for clients from various domains.

Other clients:
- Yatırım Finansman (Security broker in Turkey)
- Kino.kz (Event discovery and ticketing solutions platform in Kazakhstan)
- Albaraka Türk (Interest-free banking in Turkey)
profile_positions.title: User Experience Designer

profile_positions.description:
HundrED researches and shares inspiring innovations in education and provides visibility to innovations that are valuable, impactful & scalable to foster an inclusive movement across the world.
- As a HundrED Academy Member, I took part in the review process for the HundrED Global Collection 2024.
- I worked to identify and recommended education innovations that are changing the way children learn. 
- I supported trials of innovations in my area of expertise in user experience design. 
- Using my area of expertise in user experience design, I helped HundrED to identify innovations that are impactful and scalable.
profile_positions.title: Academy Member, Product Design

profile_positions.description:
- Designed the learning experience, and developed the curriculum and content for the Introduction to the UX/UI Design online short course as a part of Re:Coded's Inspire Series.

re-coded.com/courses/intro-to-ux-ui-design

- 1K+ young professional students in the MENA region who aspire to pursue a career in UX/UI design benefit from the course.
profile_positions.title: UX/UI Specialist

profile_positions.description: Safe Internet for Children (Kontrol Bende) is a community impact program of Meta implemented in collaboration with Habitat Foundation. Advisory board members contribute to determining the rules, general principles, and principles of content that will help children under the age of 13 to use the internet safely and beneficially within the framework of children's rights while pointing to the academic literature and contribute directly to the projects of Meta Turkey Public Policies that these principles and rules will be applied.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board Member - Safe Internet for Children 2020

profile_positions.description:
- Co-lectured a workshop within the framework of NID Open Electives, which are a set of two-week-long multidisciplinary workshops offered to the second-year students of the Bachelor of Design (B.Des.) and the first-year students of the Master of Design (M.Des.) programs across the three NID campuses in Ahmedabad, Gandhinagar, and Bengaluru. 
- Some of the primary objectives of the Open Elective are to inculcate trans-disciplinary approaches, explorations, experimentation, expansion of thinking, consciousness, and possibilities amongst the students.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
Working at the Education Reform Initiative of Sabancı University,
- Designed and innovated social & community impact programs through strategic partnerships.
- Developed and led the execution of ERI’s digital transformation vision and strategy. 
- Co-designed ERI's digital service platform, namely Turkey's Education Ecosystem Digital Platform, and co-leading ERI’s transition into a platform-based business model in line with UN SDG 4.
profile_positions.title: Digital Strategy & Collaborations Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
- Led strategic communications and campaigns which tripled the number of followers on social media.
- Managed the overall voice on all communication channels reaching out to approximately 300K by crafting an umbrella content strategy.
- Curated annually organized Good Practices in Education Conferences hosting approximately 1,000 people every year.
- Communicated data on reports, policy notes, and papers such as but not limited to the Education Monitoring Reports, Community Building Through Inclusive Education Research Report, PISA 2015 Turkey Policy Note, etc.
- Coordinated media relations to ensure successful publishing and press coverage.
- Coordinated relations with institutional supporters, stakeholders, and 3rd parties including
creative agencies, editors, translators, influencers, etc.
- Coordinated the communications team of 3 full-timers and the departmental budget.

Key Achievements: 
- Advised the Minister of National Education on the communication strategy of “Turkey’s Education Vision 2023” published by the Ministry of National Education in 2018.
- Integrated digital campaign “The Wonderers (Merak Edenler)” received a total of five awards at the MediaCat Felis Awards 2019 and two awards at Crystal Apple Awards 2019, the most prestigious advertising awards ceremonies in Turkey.
- Digital campaign "Hidden Achievements (Saklı Kalan Başarılar)" received two awards at Crystal Apple Awards 2020 and one award at Felis Awards 2020.
profile_positions.title: Digital Communications Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
- Used behavioral economics principles in order to design behavior-changing communications, platforms, and campaigns.
- Developed marketing strategies for global and local brands.
- Defined effective media and strategic partnerships that boost business goals. 
- Coordinated global qualitative market research in African, Middle Eastern, and European markets as the lead strategist. 
- Moderated 1-1 interviews, conducted desk research, made data analysis and defined pain points/areas for growth. 
- Prepared trends and best-case analyses in order to forecast new businesses and investments. 
- Co-managed ideation workshops (a group of up to 50) and coordinated all 3rd party relations with creative, digital, media, performance, and research agencies, pitching, etc.

Applied behavioral economics methodologies into marketing and communication strategies of Digiturk - 2017 communication strategy, Fiat – Fiat Egea “Ezber Bozan” product launch strategy, Garanti Payment Systems – Brand architecture and segmentation strategies, Hayat Kimya – Molfix global communication strategy (Turkey, Nigeria, Egypt, Russia, Tunisia), L’oreal Paris - Garnier Mineral product launch strategy, The Coca-Cola Company – Future trend analysis and defining areas to grow, Unilever - Defining luxury code of home care and personal care brands.

volunteer_experiences.description: As a part of the Aposto! Creator Community, I published "Ümitvâr" newsletters covering purposeful innovations, brands, and communities worldwide that inspire hope.

As a columnist, I publish op-eds on art, culture, and civil society in Turkey.
www.sivilsayfalar.org/author/ozge-karakaya/
I created content based on my personal traveling experiences, prepared travel news, and made interviews for Hürriyet Seyahat, the travel supplement of Hürriyet.
I published articles regarding ad-hoc research findings and analysis about recent marketing happenings and news in Turkey on behalf of the Behavior Institute, a FutureBright Group company.
As an art volunteer, I guided the visitor groups in the Salvador Dali exhibition at CerModern Museum in Ankara.
